channel.title: I need some help with these things - thanks!
channel.description:
ok im creating a server i needhelp with the following:
Fixing the connection lost + and add emote for when you die
Make dueling like dodians (right click duel > duel on spot (cant walk) also working stakes) - i ahve it but you can walk, and when u attack this weird emote happens and u cnat attack ppl :/
Change how strong Npc are (i ahve chickens that are really strong - i need then weak for training) - help
How i edit drops by npc, cause i edit and it dont work :/
-----------------------------------------------------------
I need to make it so you need to use my client to play it
-----------------------------------------------------------
Anncounment GUI ( i had one but i got really weird erro)
spells need runes
I knwo its a big list, but i really need help with them, you can Pm me help onhere which woudl be good,
cheeers :D
btw im using firescape source
